name: Tutorial 3 - Generating Numbers
description: Generating numbers, note the number generators are surrounded by double brackets
definition: Dice notation and multiplier - <number of dice>d<die type>x<multiplier>:  ((3d6x10)), ((1d12x100))
Dice notation and addition - <number of dice>d<die type>+<add>: ((2d4+2)), ((3d6+4))
Dice notation and subtraction - <number of dice>d<die type>-<subtract>: ((4d4-1)), ((3d6-2))
